pageContext.claim: “A massive 200 Billion Dollar Sea Wall, built around New York to protect it from rare storms, is a costly, foolish & environmentally unfriendly idea that, when needed, probably won't work anyway. It will also look terrible. Sorry, you'll just have to get your mops & buckets ready!”
pageContext.analysis: The proposed sea wall, designed to protect against massive storms, is still in the planning stages and would take 25 years to build. The current estimate for its cost is $119 billion, not $200 billion.
